snippet: Reporters and editors at The Plain Dealer are trying to prevent layoffs and the end of a daily print product in an unusual way, by taking their case directly to the public.
abstract: Reporters and editors at The Plain Dealer are trying to prevent layoffs and the end of a daily print product in an unusual way, by taking their case directly to the public.

headline.main: A Cleveland Newspaper Takes Steps to Prevent Cuts
headline.print_headline: A Cleveland Newspaper Takes Steps to Prevent Cuts
